Uses of Interface
timer.Timer

  • Packages that use Timer 
    Package Description
    arraySorter
    ArraySorters are objects that provide a sort method that will sort arrays of Comparables.
    stringSearcher
    String searchers will search for the first occurrence of a given substring in superstrings.
    timer
    Timers provide a facility for timing execution of defined methods from classes for varying "sizes of problem".

    • Uses of Timer in arraySorter

      Classes in arraySorter that implement Timer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BubbleSortTimer<T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>
      Base implementation for bubble sort timers.
      class  CharacterBubbleSortTimer
      Time character bubble sorters.
      class  IntegerBubbleSortTimer
      Time integer bubble sorters.
      Methods in arraySorter that return Timer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Timer CharacterBubbleSortTimer.getTimer(int size) 
      Timer IntegerBubbleSortTimer.getTimer(int size) 

    • Uses of Timer in stringSearcher

      Classes in stringSearcher that implement Timer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SequentialSearcherSubstringSizeTimer
      Times the sequential searcher for varying sizes of substring.
      class  SequentialSearcherSuperstringSizeTimer
      Times the sequential searcher for varying sizes of superstring.
      Methods in stringSearcher that return Timer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Timer SequentialSearcherSuperstringSizeTimer.getTimer(int size) 
      Timer SequentialSearcherSubstringSizeTimer.getTimer(int size) 

    • Uses of Timer in timer

      Methods in timer that return Timer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Timer Timer.getTimer(int size)
      Get a timer.Timer object with a task of the given size for the timed method.
